page.title: 02PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: These are some of the games played on our playground: Chocolate, Tick, Polo, Scarecrow Tick, Elastics, British Bulldog, Captain's Coming, Marbles, Skipping and Hopscotch. This is how to play{Captain's Coming:}The girl on can shout 'Port' or 'Starboard' and you have to run to a corner.If she shouts "Swing the Boom", you have to bob down. "Scrub the Deck" and "Climb the Rigging" mean you have to pretend to do these things. If you are the last to do these actions, you are on. {Chocolate}is played like this:The girl "on" stands about 10 metres away. The others have to creep up on her, but she can turn round suddenly. If she sees you, you have to freeze with your arm out. If someone can tick you they say'Chocolate' and you can go back. If you are ticked before you reach the children, then you are "on".
